definition: huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
see 黃芪|黄芪[huang2 qi2]

sentences.english: Objective To observe the influence of different doses of astragalus in cats.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察不同劑量的黃芪對貓正常血壓的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of radix astragali in antiaging .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黃芪的抗衰老作用及作用機制。

sentences.english: Eating Dangshen and Huangqi herbs is also good for this .
sentences.chinese: 喫黨蔘和黃芪也對這個有好處。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect on the extract of Astragalus polysaccharides by ultrasonic cell disrupter.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究超聲細胞粉碎儀對黃芪多糖提取的影響。

sentences.english: Astragalus polysaccharides was provided by Shanghai Institute of Physiology of Academia Sinica.
sentences.chinese: 黃芪多糖由原中國科學院上海生理學研究所提供。

sentences.english: Objective To review the pharmacological action and clinical application of Radix Astragali .
sentences.chinese: 目的綜述黃芪的藥理作用及臨牀應用的研究概況。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Astragalus can promote OECs proliferation and the secretion of neurotrophic factors.
sentences.chinese: 黃芪注射液能促進嗅鞘細胞增殖及分泌神經營養因子。

sentences.english: Object] Studying acute toxicity and maximum tolerable dose of Astragalus composition F3 new preparation.
sentences.chinese: 究黃芪成分F3新制劑的急性毒性和最大耐受量。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the compatible stability of Astragalus mongholicus injection in TNA.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察黃芪注射液與全營養混合液配伍的穩定性。

sentences.english: This paper is to introduce Radix Astragali cultivation techniques in the planted ginseng field.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹在栽參後的老參地裏，栽培黃芪的技術。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo provide reference for rational exploiting and utilizing the plant of Hedysarum Linn.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲合理開發利用巖黃芪屬植物資源提供。

sentences.english: Methods The content of Astragaloside IV was determined by TLCS.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用薄層掃描法測定其中黃芪甲苷的含量。

sentences.english: This article reports the effects of pure Astragalus preparation(PAP) in treating 115 cases of leucopenia.
sentences.chinese: 用純黃芪製劑治療白細胞減少症115例。

sentences.english: Studying acute toxicity and maximum tolerable dose of Astragalus composition F3 new preparation.
sentences.chinese: 研究黃芪成分F3新制劑的急性毒性和最大耐受量。

sentences.english: The invention also discloses a preparation method of the astragalus health-care food.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還公開了一種黃芪保健食品的製備方法。

sentences.english: After injecting astragalus in the points, prepared model by hypodermic injection of scopolamine.
sentences.chinese: 穴位注射黃芪注射液後，皮下注射東莨菪鹼造模。

definition: poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
dried ginger
Salvia miltiorrhiza
ladybell root (Radix adenophorae)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
milk vetch/plant genus Astragalus/huangqi 黃芪|黄芪, Astragalus membranaceus (used in TCM)
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
Manchurian wild ginger (family Asarum)
poria mushroom (Polyporus umbellatus)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
